snippet: Kenya’s antidoping agency said it had begun an investigation into a report in which two athletes barred for failing drug tests at last year’s world championships accused a senior official of asking them for money in exchange for more lenient punishments.
abstract: Kenya's antidoping agency begins investigating bribery accusations by two athletes, who were barred for failing drug tests, against senior official at 2014's world championships.
lead_paragraph: Kenya’s antidoping agency said it had begun an investigation into a report in which two athletes barred for failing drug tests at last year’s world championships accused a senior official of asking them for money in exchange for more lenient punishments.
